abstract.t: This document reports implementation experience of precis framework [I-D.ietf-precis-framework], for SASLprepbis [I-D.ietf-precis-saslprepbis], Nickname [I-D.ietf-precis-nickname] and XMPPbis [I-D.ietf-xmpp-6122bis], and findings from the experience. And this document further discusses considerations to implement precis framework.
